name: Sean Bollin
body:
### Background
Web/mobile developer with over 7 years experience.

iOS, Javascript, HTML/CSS, Ruby, Rails, PHP, OOP, Git, Linux, MySQL, Agile, Scrum, and more.

I am a contributor to the Apache Cordova (Phonegap) mobile project.

In my free time, currently developing a mobile multi-player RPG in C++ for iOS and Android using Cocos2d-x/ENet and studying data structures/algorithms.
